item.title: OS X to Fedora 20: The User Experience, Part 2
item.description: Just tuning in? Have a look at Part 1 to find out how I installed Fedora 20 on a MacBook Air and why I am so interested in trying to duplicate or even surpass the user experience that I previously enjoyed with OS X. The Cloud Cloud-based mail, calendaring and file synching have really levelled the playing field between the desktop OSes. It doesnâ€™t matter if you are using OS X or Linux if you read your e-mail in a web browser.
